snippet: Pak Chong Mar, 75, of Queens, used a box cutter, saying he meant no harm to anyone else.
abstract: Pak Chong Mar cuts himself with box cutter outside the Today show studio at Rockefeller Center; police say Mar is in stable condition at Bellevue Hospital Center, where he will undergo psychiatric evaluation.
lead_paragraph: Pak Chong Mar, 75, of Queens, used a box cutter, saying he meant no harm to anyone else.

headline.seo: Man Slashes His Arms Outside ‘Today’ Show Studio
headline.main: Man Slashes His Arms Outside ‘Today’ Show Studio
headline.print_headline: Man Slashes Arms Outside Studio Of ‘Today’ Show
